name: TheCardBoard
tag_list: web-2-0, business-card, marketing, advertising, viral, directory
overview:
TheCardBoard is an online business card bulletin board.

It is a searchable database of business cards. Sort cards by location, industry or keywords. Once you find a business card you’re interested in you can click on it to find out more information such as preferred method of contact, send them a message, link back to their website, map their location and submit a review.

The site is ideal for small business owners and people in sales or marketing.

Scan your business card, create an account and upload. Fill out your information and post your card. The site is free.
